IV.ii.1.A.1.i
.
Documenting the Cancellation of Review Examinations
If a future examination control described in
M21-1, Part IV, Subpart ii, 1.B
, is canceled, place a note in VBMS as to the reason for cancellation.

, and
rating action after a future examination is canceled, see
M21-1, Part IV, Subpart ii, 2.A
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Determining the Need for Review Examinations
citation: Part IV, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
